programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Now that her sons have fledged the nest, today's buyer wants a new lease of life in a rural home that has business potential. She's set her sights on either Devon or Dorset, where Briony May Williams has some wonderful property options to show her. Briony also meets another entrepreneurial couple who've converted an old railway carriage into a fine dining destination.

programme.title: The Bidding Room
programme.desc: Five dealers bid to buy a racing tricycle, Sindy toys and a milking machine.

programme.title: Between the Covers
programme.desc: Sara Cox is joined by broadcaster Angela Scanlon, DJ Spoony, barrister turned author and broadcaster Rob Rinder and musician and presenter Cerys Matthews. They share their favourite books and review the two book club choices: the first of the new book picks, In the Blink of an Eye by Jo Callaghan, and the first of a selection of books set in Europe to celebrate Eurovision, Burial Rites by Hannah Kent, which is set in Iceland.

programme.title: Caught Red Handed
programme.desc: A mother has just got home with her newborn baby when masked burglars smash in.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: A suivre, les dernières actualités présentées par les équipes rédactionnelles de la BBC, le très réputé radiodiffuseur du service public britannique. Créée en 1922 à Londres, la British Broadcast Corporation est connue pour être la plus ancienne société diffusant des programmes de radio ou de télévision au monde.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: A suivre, les dernières actualités présentées par les équipes rédactionnelles de la BBC, le très réputé radiodiffuseur du service public britannique. Créée en 1922 à Londres, la British Broadcast Corporation est connue pour être la plus ancienne société diffusant des programmes de radio ou de télévision au monde.

programme.title: Impossible
programme.desc: Pas de description

programme.title: Eggheads
programme.desc: Jeremy Vine hosts a general knowledge quiz featuring the greatest quiz team in Britain.

programme.title: Gymnastique artistique : Championnats d'Europe masculin
programme.desc: Pas de description

programme.title: My Unique B&B
programme.desc: Saison 2 Episode 14 Simon and the team tackle a tin shed in Wiltshire that must be off-grid and moveable. Année de réalisation : 2022

programme.title: Flog It !
programme.desc: Hundreds of local people are welcomed with their family heirlooms at the stately home of Boconnoc in Cornwall. The experts find the most interesting items to go to auction and hopefully make some money. Meanwhile, Paul Martin explores nearby Caerhays Castle.

programme.title: Richard Osman's House of Games
programme.desc: Kaye Adams, Mark Chapman, Philip Glenister and Thanyia Moore face more trivia questions.

programme.title: B&B By the Sea
programme.desc: Checking in to the B&B is Welsh musician, author and radio host Cerys Matthews. Cerys may have travelled the world with her music, but this is her first visit to Northern Ireland's Causeway Coast, as well as a special B&B by the sea. Cerys and chef Alex visit a local farm with a passion for turning rapeseed flowers into delicious flavoured oils. They meet Richard, a sixth generation farmer, and his wife Leona to learn more about their home-grown rapeseed oil. Cerys and Alex can't help but take some of the flavoured oils back to the B&B to match with the evening meal. Knowing Cerys' love of cooking and Japanese flavours, chef Alex asks her to assist in preparing the B&B dinner. They make a dish of miso baked aubergines with a mixed bean salad, as well as a light and airy souffle cheesecake, the perfect end to the day.

programme.title: Jay's Yorkshire Workshop
programme.desc: Furniture is made to thank a dedicated veteran and a couple who've fostered 130 children.

programme.title: Reunion Hotel
programme.desc: A 1960s girl band and boy band reunite and a terror attack survivor thanks her teacher.

programme.title: Brian Cox: Seven Days on Mars
programme.desc: Brian Cox follows Nasa's Perseverance rover mission as it hunts for signs of life on Mars.

programme.title: Newsnight
programme.desc: The day's important national and international news stories. With Victoria Derbyshire.

programme.title: Last Woman on Earth with Sara Pascoe
programme.desc: Writer and comedian Sara Pascoe returns with her unique travelogue, learning how to do the world's endangered jobs. In Greece, she meets the last monk in a monastery, a family of church bell makers and some villagers who communicate by whistling to each other.

programme.title: Saving Lives in Leeds
programme.desc: Neurosurgeon Ryan Mathew performs awake brain surgery on a patient with a large tumour.

programme.title: Amanda & Alan's Italian Job
programme.desc: Amanda and Alan face their final challenge as they join forces to renovate the last two rooms. Their dream of creating an open-plan living and dining room is dented when they discover the main structural wall dividing the two spaces requires a much smaller arch than they anticipated. For this final space, they agree to put their design differences to one side, but a disagreement over the shape of the arch threatens to divide them. Wanting to make the rooms feel as authentic as possible, Amanda and Alan take a boat trip along the stunning Zingaro nature reserve to get inspiration from the Sicilian landscape, and they enjoy sunset on horseback in the ancient Greek city of Selinunte.

programme.title: We need to talk about Cosby
programme.desc: Saison 1 Episode 2 In the 1970s, Bill Cosby is on a path to becoming an educator and moral authority. Année de réalisation : 2022

programme.title: Becoming Frida Kahlo
programme.desc: Saison 1 Episode 2 La deuxième partie explore l'arrivée aux États-Unis, la créativité artistique mais aussi l'anxiété personnelle de Frida. Nous découvrons l'implication de Frida et Diego dans les prémisses du mouvement des droits civiques. Année de réalisation : 2023

programme.title: This is BBC Two
programme.desc: This is BBC Two.
